Shifa Panjwani is an aspiring BI Developer currently pursuing a B.S. in Mathematics-Computer Science & Finance at College of Idaho. With a strong interest in data visualization, she enjoys creating intuitive dashboards on Power BI and Tableau to make complex data accessible and actionable. Right now, she's diving deeper into [data-viz](https://pudding.cool/2018/08/pockets/) and preparing for the [PL-300 Certification](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/credentials/certifications/data-analyst-associate/?practice-assessment-type=certification) to further expand her skill set.
